name: Shiny Celebi
description:
Celebi is a Grass/Psychic-type mythical Pokémon from the Generation II Pokémon games (Pokémon Gold/Silver). This Celebi has its pink Shiny colors instead of the usual green. This is an in-game sprite from Pokémon Mystery Dungeon: Explorers of Time/Darkness/Sky for the Nintendo DS, which feature Shiny Celebi as a supporting character.

This art was a collaboration between r/MysteryDungeon, Pokémon in r/place, and r/HollowKnight.
